revision.text:
{{Infobox person | name = Jessica Chaffin | image = | birth_date = | birth_place = [[Newton, Massachusetts]], U.S. | occupation = Actress, comedian, writer | yearsactive = 1999–present }} '''Jessica Chaffin''' is an American actress, comedian, and writer best known as part of the comedy duo [[Ronna and Beverly]] with [[Jamie Denbo]]. She is also known for her recurring role as Coco Wexler on [[Nickelodeon]]'s ''[[Zoey 101]]'' and appearing in the films ''[[Spy (2015 film)|Spy]]'' and ''[[The Heat (film)|The Heat]]''. Chaffin starred as Marie Faldonado in the [[CBS]] sitcom ''[[Man with a Plan (TV series)|Man With A Plan]]'', opposite [[Matt LeBlanc]]. ==Early life== Chaffin was born and raised in [[Newton, Massachusetts]]. Her father is from a [[Jewish]] family, and her mother, who is of Scottish and English ancestry, [[Conversion to Judaism|converted to Judaism]]; Chaffin was raised Jewish.{{cite web|last=Carley |first=Brennan |url=http://www.bostonmagazine.com/arts-entertainment/blog/2013/05/28/ronna-and-beverly-talk-performing-for-ben-affleck/ |title=Ronna and Beverly Talk Performing for Ben Affleck |publisher=Boston Magazine |date=2013-05-28 |accessdate=2017-02-09}}{{Cite web|url=http://www.thejc.com/arts/arts-features/110324/jewish-mother-comics-ronna-and-beverly-are-feeling-the-heat|title=Jewish mother comics Ronna and Beverly are feeling The Heat|last=|first=|date=|website=www.thejc.com|archive-url=|archive-date=|dead-url=|access-date=2017-10-09}} Her brother, Joshua Chaffin, is a writer for the ''[[Financial Times]]''. ==Career== She is a regular performer at the [[Upright Citizens Brigade Theatre]] in Los Angeles, often performing with her comedy partner [[Jamie Denbo]].{{cite web |url=http://losangeles.ucbtheatre.com/talent/view/5156 |title=Jessica Chaffin |publisher=[[Upright Citizens Brigade Theatre]] |accessdate=November 28, 2012}} She has done many guest voice appearances on [[Nickelodeon]] animated programs. From 2008 to 2009, she worked with [[Amy Poehler]] as a writer and voice actor on the animated series ''[[The Mighty B!]]'' playing several roles, including that of Portia's cousin, Chelsea. Chaffin is also known for playing Coco Wexler, the girls' dorm adviser on all four seasons of Nickelodeon's ''[[Zoey 101]]''. Chaffin has made guest appearances on television programs such as ''[[Weeds (TV series)|Weeds]]'', ''[[Entourage (U.S. TV series)|Entourage]]'', and ''[[Curb Your Enthusiasm]]''. In December 2009, her comedy pilot ''Ronna & Beverly'' (based on the popular stage show she performs with Denbo at the Upright Citizens Brigade Theatre) aired on [[Showtime (TV channel)|Showtime]]. ''Ronna & Beverly'' was eventually turned into a six-part comedy talk show, which was co-produced by [[Paul Feig]] and premiered on September 10, 2012 on [[Sky Atlantic|Sky Atlantic HD]] in the United Kingdom.{{cite web |last=Kemp |first=Stuart |url=http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/paul-feig-ronny-beverly-uk-tv-show-330369 |title=Paul Feig Co-Producing 'Ronna & Beverly' For Sky Atlantic |work=[[The Hollywood Reporter]] |publisher=[[Prometheus Global Media]] |date=May 29, 2012 |accessdate=November 28, 2012}}{{cite web |url=http://skyatlantic.sky.com/ronna-beverly/bridesmaids-paul-feig-introduces-ronna-beverly |title=Bridesmaids' Paul Feig Introduces Ronna & Beverly |publisher=[[Sky Atlantic|Sky Atlantic HD]] |accessdate=November 28, 2012}} Together with Denbo, Chaffin created the ''[[Ronna and Beverly]]'' podcast. Chaffin is formerly a series regular on the CBS sitcom ''[[Man with a Plan (TV series)|Man With A Plan]]''. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Film ! Year ! Title !
